markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cleansing Subroutine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2460) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 71 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your nanites help purge your body of harmful chemicals and toxins. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) poison. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing poison reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent poison.
name: Cleansing Subroutine
